org.epri.pt2.controller
Class AbstractProtocolController

java.lang.Object
  org.epri.pt2.listeners.ViewCallback
      org.epri.pt2.controller.AbstractProtocolController

public class AbstractProtocolController
extends ViewCallback

Controls the addition, update, and removal of AbstractProtocolDO objects from the hibernate database.

Author:
tdo
